project_abstract.cdata: The objectives of the Road Sector Institutional Support Technical Assistance Project are to: a) strengthen road sector management capability; b) improve sector policy and management; and c) prepare physical infrastructure components to be included in the proposed First Road Sector Project which will contribute to economic growth and poverty alleviation and to an improved access to social services. The project will consist of the following components: a) institutional development and capacity building through employment of technical assistance staff; b) sector policy and management studies; c) infrastructure preparation studies; and d) external auditing.
